name: triumphantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that suggests you have achieved a victory or feel happy because of achieving a victory: Bob triumphantly announced his promotion. "Here it is!" he said triumphantly. See
triumphant
More examplesFewer examplesThey dream of the day when they can march triumphantly into the capital city.She waved triumphantly to the crowd in the stadium.The army triumphantly declared that they had seized the city from the rebels.
